simplified: 各人自扫门前雪，莫管他家瓦上霜

pronunciation.pinyin: gè rén zì sǎo mén qián xuě , mò guǎn tā jiā wǎ shàng shuāng
pronunciation.wade_giles_pinyin: ge4 ren2 zi4 sao3 men2 qian2 xue3 , mo4 guan3 ta1 jia1 wa3 shang4 shuang1

details.simplified: 各人自扫门前雪，莫管他家瓦上霜
details.traditional: 各人自掃門前雪，莫管他家瓦上霜

meanings.value: sweep the snow from your own door step, don't worry about the frost on your neighbor's roof
